title: Johnathon Ford from Unwed Sailor and Roadside Monument
itunes:title: Johnathon Ford from Unwed Sailor and Roadside Monument
description:
Boy oh boy do we have a great chat on this weeks podcast with Johnathon Ford from prolific post-rock outfit Unwed Sailor and the often overlooked Roadside Monument. We dive into the discussion with gusto and talk about the early Tooth and Nail years, longevity and playing insturmental music. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
